"How to Use a Photon Blast":
"A \"Photon Blast\" is a powerful attack that can be registered to and activated from the Subpalette.


The Photon Blast gauge fills as you take actions in battle. When the gauge is full, you can use your Photon Blast."
"You can register your Photon Blast to the Subpalette by selecting <yellow>\"Equipment/Palette\"<c> from the main menu, then selecting <yellow>\"Subpalette\"<c>."

"Select the slot you want to use, and the list of options for that slot will appear.
Select Use \"Photon Blast\" to register it.

Once it's registered, close the menu with <%Cancel>, and you're ready to go."

"When the Photon Blast gauge fills during battle, use <%SubPaletteLeft> and <%SubPaletteRight> to position the Subpalette cursor on the Photon Blast icon, then use <%SubPalette> to activate it.
If playing with a keyboard, you can also use the number keys to activate Subpalette slots directly."
